title: Create your own Indoor Oasis! --- Affordable Price!
posting_body: Call today to schedule your tour of this home!
Fenced and ready for family outdoor adventures
- Brand New Energy Efficient Appliances included
If you are responding by email, please include your contact information.
*P & I. Price $591,900, 5.875% Fixed/5.928% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
Home pictured may display decorator items and furniture which are not available for purchase even upon additional payment.
Please consult an LGI Homes new home consultant and review a home sales contract for additional information and disclosures.
